results.name: Expansion of (1-x)*(2*x^2+2*x+1) / ((x^2-x-1)*(x^2+x+1)).
reference: C. Dement, Floretion Integer Sequences (work in progress)
link: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-2,-1,0,1).
formula: a(n) = -2*a(n-1) - a(n-2) + a(n-4) for n>4. - _Colin Barker_, May 18 2019
maple: Floretion Algebra Multiplication Program, FAMP Code: 2tesseq[(.5'j + .5'k + .5j' + .5k' + .5'ij' - .5'ik' + .5'ji' + .5'ki')*(.5'i + .5'j + .5'k + .5e)]
results.author: _Creighton Dement_, Nov 18 2005
